metadata.Title: CVE-2022-22892 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.Description: There is an Assertion 'ecma_is_value_undefined (value) ||ecma_is_value_null (value) || ecma_is_value_boolean (value) ||ecma_is_value_number (value) || ecma_is_value_string (value) ||ecma_is_value_bigint (value) || ecma_is_value_symbol (value) ||ecma_is_value_object (value)' failed atjerry-core/ecma/base/ecma-helpers-value.c in Jerryscripts 3.0.0.

criterions.comment: iotjs package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
